Translations.Text: Kafu. Eiko ni michita kuruan ni yotte chikau
Iya, kare-ra wa jibun-tachi no ma kara hitori no keikoku-sha ga arawareta koto ni odoroki, sokode fushinjin'na-sha-tachi wa iu. `Kore wa mattaku fushigina kotodearu
Watashi-tachi ga shinde chiri ni natte (mata yomigaeru no) ka. Sore wa (rikai dekinai) tondemonai yomigaeridearu
Ware wa daichi ga, kare-ra o ikaga ni mushibami saru ka o shitte iru. Mata waga temoto ni wa,( å‡¡ Yuru shiju no) kiroku no chobo ga aru
Shinri ga otozureta toki, sore o kyogi to shitanode, kare-ra wa konran jotai ni ochitta
Kare-ra wa zujo no ten o minai no ka. Ware ga ikaga ni sore o sozo shi, ikaga ni sore o kazatta ka. Soshite soreni wa, sukoshi no kizu mo nai to iu no ni
Mata, ware wa daichi o uchi hiroge, sono-jo ni yamayama o sue, samazama no shurui no utsukushi (kusaki) o, oishigera seru
(Sorera wa) kaigo shite (omo no omoto ni) kaeru subete no shimo be ga, yoku kansatsu subeki kotodeari, kyokundearu
Ware wa mata, shukufuku suru ame o ten kara fura sete, kaju-en ya shukaku no kokumotsu o yutaka ni seicho sa seru
Bisshiri to mi o tsuketa take no takai natsumeyashi no ki wa
(arra no) shimo be-tachi no shokuryo. Mata sore (ame) de ware wa shinda daichi o yomigaera seru. Yobidashi (fukkatsu) ni shite mo onajiyona koto
Kare-ra izen mo,(shito o) uso-tsuki yobawari shita mono ga atta. Nufu no min mo, rassu no nakama mo samudo mo
mata ado no min mo, firuaun mo, ruto no doho mo
mata mori no nakama mata tobbau no min mo kai shito o uso-tsuki yobawari shita. Dakara (ware no) keikoku wa kakujitsu ni jitsugen sa rete shimatta
Saisho no sozo no tame ni, ware ga tsukareta to iu no ka. Iya, kare-ra wa atarashi sozo ni tsuite utagai o daite iru
